body_html:
@asimshankar Thank you for your reply I agree that it seems Anaconda has screwed it up, I do not activate Anaconda but use the base install (root) which Anaconda has used by modifying the system to access Anaconda Python in all cases from the command prompt.
Would appreciate any guidance how to fix, I'll raise with Anaconda channel as well.
So in response to your questions: (note as mentioned I do not Activate Anaconda)

tom@tomServal:~$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
:/usr/local/cuda/lib64
tom@tomServal:~$ ldd /home/tom/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-   packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fff1f58f000)
libcudart.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 (0x00007f875ce98000)
libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f875cc6f000)
libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f875c966000)
libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f875c749000)
libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f875c3c6000)
libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f875c1b0000)
libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f875bde7000)
/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x000055bcc7b32000)
librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007f875bbde000)
tom@tomServal:~$

@asimshankar Thank you for your reply I agree that it seems Anaconda has screwed it up, I do not activate Anaconda but use the base install (root) which Anaconda has used by modifying the system to access Anaconda Python in all cases from the command prompt.

body:
@asimshankar Thank you for your reply I agree that it seems Anaconda has screwed it up, I do not activate Anaconda but use the base install (root) which Anaconda has used by modifying the system to access Anaconda Python in all cases from the command prompt.
Would appreciate any guidance how to fix, I'll raise with Anaconda channel as well.
So in response to your questions: (note as mentioned I do not Activate Anaconda)

```
tom@tomServal:~$ echo $LD_LIBRARY_PATH
:/usr/local/cuda/lib64
tom@tomServal:~$ ldd /home/tom/anaconda3/lib/python3.5/site-   packages/tensorflow/python/_pywrap_tensorflow.so
linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00007fff1f58f000)
libcudart.so.8.0 => /usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so.8.0 (0x00007f875ce98000)
libdl.so.2 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libdl.so.2 (0x00007f875cc6f000)
libm.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6 (0x00007f875c966000)
libpthread.so.0 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0 (0x00007f875c749000)
libstdc++.so.6 => /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00007f875c3c6000)
libgcc_s.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00007f875c1b0000)
libc.so.6 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6 (0x00007f875bde7000)
/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x000055bcc7b32000)
librt.so.1 => /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so.1 (0x00007f875bbde000)
tom@tomServal:~$ 
```
